pr_title: Invalid privacy error in prebid response

timeline.message: Invalid privacy error in prebid response

timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: It's better to use this before @test
timeline.author: DGarbar

replies.bodyText:
Joshua Bloch in Effective Java 3 said
"Always use the SuppressWarnings annotation on the smallest scope possible. Typically this will be a variable declaration or a very short method or constructor. Never use SuppressWarnings on an entire class. Doing so could mask critical warnings.
If you find yourself using the SuppressWarnings annotation on a method or constructor that’s more than one line long, you may be able to move it onto a local variable declaration. "
replies.author: BraslavskiyAndrey

replies.bodyText: don't think it is critical, up to you.
replies.author: rpanchyk
